title: When will Ornn get released?
body: I'm a main jg and ornn looks like a jg so I want to try him out. But he is not out yet so I want to know when will he get released. I need to know so I can save up. Thanks

replies.body: Every single time a new champ or champ update is announced there is always one of these, DO YOU KNOW WHAT A PATCH CYCLE IS???

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xAEYEA7w,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-19T02:22:42.580+0000)
>
> Every single time a new champ or champ update is announced there is always one of these, DO YOU KNOW WHAT A PATCH CYCLE IS???

Yo Fitzy,

CALM DOWN

This summoner is clearly just a little confused and lacks the knowledge you obviously have. 

Be nice to your fellow summoners :D

I'm sorry who the fuck are you? Not sure how long you have been here but there's at least 3 of these posts every single time it's getting pretty annoying how oblivious people are. If every new champ comes out in the next patch cycle then you would think that the next champ would be released IN THE NEXT PATCH CYCLE.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xAEYEA7w,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-08-19T13:02:14.863+0000)
>
> I'm sorry who the fuck are you? Not sure how long you have been here but there's at least 3 of these posts every single time it's getting pretty annoying how oblivious people are. If every new champ comes out in the next patch cycle then you would think that the next champ would be released IN THE NEXT PATCH CYCLE.

Hi Fitzy,

My names purplerain :) Nice to meet you as well :P

Sometimes people just DONT know what they dont know. So you can't get angry at them. 

Just gotta be as helpful as possible.

> Sometimes people just DONT know what they dont know. So you can't get angry at them. 

Is English your primary language? If it is what the fuck did you just type? Here I'll reword it for you:

Sometimes people are fucking idiots. So you can't get angry at them.

Yeah you're right, Riot should probably add a little message "X champion will be released in X patch" when they announce a champion. Maybe then the retards might finally figure out how it works.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xAEYEA7w,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-20T08:22:35.389+0000)
>
> Is English your primary language? If it is what the fuck did you just type? Here I'll reword it for you:
> 
> Sometimes people are fucking idiots. So you can't get angry at them.
> 
> Yeah you're right, Riot should probably add a little message "X champion will be released in X patch" when they announce a champion. Maybe then the retards might finally figure out how it works.

I'm sorry you feel this way about those who post 'when is x champ coming out'.

Clearly, I haven't been on here long enough to witness the countless posts regarding when new champs will be released. 

However, it doesn't excuse why you need to get so angry instead of redirecting your fellow summoners.
Oh trust me I've told people countless times, probably won't bother again since no one ever learns.

Hi Awesomeslash :P

Look out for the next patch which will be coming out in the upcoming weeks. 
That's when a new champs gets released (alongside the new patch update)  :D

Keep an eye out for the new patch !!! The new champ looks exciting reminds me of Torb from overwatch
I haven't been counting the weeks, but he either comes out next week or the week after.
Learn what a patch cycle is.
